Description.Text: The Marcel is within walking distance or quick transit to the Chelsea, Union Square, Gramercy Park and Midtown areas. Nearby area attractions include The Empire State Building, shopping in Herald and Union Squares, the Fashion District and Madison Square Garden. LaGuardia Airport is approximately 20 minutes from the hotel and JFK International Airport.

Baruch College main building - 1 block School of Visual Arts - 1 block Madison Square Park - 2 blocks Flatiron Building (National Historic Landmark) - 5 blocks Union Square Park - 8 blocks Empire State Building - 0.75 mile Madison Square Garden/Penn Station - 1 mile Macy's department store - 1 mile Garment District - 1 mile Grand Central Terminal - 1 mile Times Square - 1 mile Theater District - 1 mile Little Italy - 1 mile Washington Square Park (Greenwich Village) - 1.25 miles Rockefeller Center - 1.5 miles Radio City Music Hall - 1.5 miles Soho district - 1.5 miles Chelsea Piers - 1.5 miles Chinatown - 1.5 miles Jacob K. Javits Convention Center - 1.75 miles Museum of Modern Art - 1.75 miles Carnegie Hall - 1.75 miles Central Park - 1.75 miles Tribeca district - 2 miles Columbus Circle (Time Warner Center, CNN tour, shopping/dining) - 2.25 miles Lincoln Center for the Performing Arts - 2.5 miles Financial District - 2.5 miles American Museum of Natural History - 2.75 miles Metropolitan Museum of Art - 2.75 miles

The Marcel offers 135 well appointed guestrooms offer custom built in beds with vibrant leather headboards, Frette linens and down comforters. In-room amenities include wireless internet with a surcharge of $9.95 per day, a 32” LCD flat screen television with cable channels and On Demand movie selections, alarm clock with IPod docking station, work desk, safe, Mini-bar, iron/ironing board and hair dryer.

The Marcel Hotel's lobby features chic designer furniture and warm wood-paneled walls. Adjacent to the lobby is a cappuccino bar, which becomes a popular setting. Popular with visitors to Baruch College and the School of Fine Arts, the Marcel Hotel provides a tranquil, informal ambience. Minimalist decor, abstract paintings, and seating of leather and plush-fabric in the lobby and lounge establish the hotel's contemporary style.
• Golf - driving range • Ice skating • Rowing or canoeing • Aerobics • Running track/path • Pilates classes/instruction • Yoga classes/instruction • Hiking/biking trails • Horse riding/rental
• Check In Time - 3 p.m. • Check Out Time - 12 p.m.

Driving directions from LaGuardia: Take Grand Central Pkwy west to I-278 (Brooklyn-Queens Expy) west. Take I-495 (Long Island Expy) west, then take the Queens Midtown tunnel and exit to 35th St/34th St. Turn left on E 34th St, then turn right on 2nd Ave. Turn right on E 23rd St, then right again on 3rd Ave. Turn right on E 24th St.
